util.weaksingleton



template WeakSingleton()
Singleton template mixin with support for polymorphism, without global access.

Note:
Any non-abstract singleton class must call singleton_ctor() in its ctor and singleton_dtor in its dtor or die() method.

void singleton_ctor();
Enforce only single instance at any given time.

void singleton_dtor();
Enforce only single instance at any given time.
